# File lib/faster_csv.rb, line 1196
  def self.parse(*args, &block)
    csv = new(*args)
    if block.nil?  # slurp contents, if no block is given
      begin
        csv.read
      ensure
        csv.close
      end
    else           # or pass each row to a provided block
      csv.each(&block)
    end
  end
